Concord.Sunvalley Shopping Center: Sunvalley Shopping Center, or more popularly "Sunvalley Mall", is a regional shopping center located in Concord, California (one of the suburbs in the San Francisco Bay Area, in east central Contra Costa County). Located off Interstate 680, Sunvalley is owned and operated by the Taubman Company and is anchored by Macy's, JCPenney, and Sears. The total square footage of the mall is 1,333,000 square feet.
